## Model.createAnimation() method

Creates a new animation for the model

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | _(Optional)_ Name of the animation to be created |

**Returns:**

[AnimationClip](doc/markdown/./scene.animationclip.md)
